Detailed Description

Module for Unicode related classes and operations.

Function Documentation

bool chaos::uni::is_digit ( chaos::uint32  code_point)

Returns whether the given Unicode code point is a digit or not.

Example usage:

chaos::uni::UTF8String s( "5" );
chaos::uni::is_digit( s.get_code_point( 0 ) ); // returns: true
chaos::uni::UTF8String chaos::uni::utf16_to_utf8 ( const char *  data,
std::size_t  symbol_length,
chaos::data::Endianness  endianness = chaos::data::ENDIAN_LITTLE 
)

Converts the given data stream of UTF-16 encoded text to new chaos::uni::UTF8String.

Parameters
dataUTF-16 string stored as 2-4 chars per symbol.
symbol_lengthThe number of Unicode symbols in the input data. Note: this is not the number of bytes in the data. If this parameter is set to chaos::uni::npos the length of the input will be calculated with the assumption it is NULL terminated.
char* chaos::uni::utf8_to_utf16 ( const chaos::uni::UTF8String &  data,
std::size_t &  r_length,
chaos::data::Endianness  endianness = chaos::data::ENDIAN_LITTLE 
)

Converts the given chaos::uni::UTF8String encoded data to a new c style string of UTF-16 encoded data.

The resulting UTF-16 data will be null terminated with 0x00, 0x00.

Warning
This operation allocates a new char array that must be deleted.
Parameters
dataUTF8String object to convert to a c style string of UTF-16 encoded data.
r_lengthReturns the length of the new UTF-16 encoded string in bytes.
endiannessThe endian to use for the UTF-16 encoding, defaults to little endian.
Returns
Newly allocated UTF-16 encoded string.
chaos::uni::UTF8String chaos::uni::join ( const std::vector< chaos::uni::UTF8String > &  components,
const chaos::uni::UTF8String &  separator 
)

Joins the given vector into a single chaos::uni::UTF8String.

The components of the vector will be concatenated together with the separator string between each component.

Example usage:

std::vector< chaos::uni::UTF8String > components;
components.push_back( "Hello" );
components.push_back( "World" );
chaos::uni::join( components, "_" ); returns: "Hello_World";
Parameters
componentsVector of string components to join together as a single string.
separatorchaos::uni::UTF8String to join each component together with.
Returns
New chaos::uni::UTF8String containing the results of the operation.
